trans-unit.source: Install or update a ClickOnce deployment on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Instala o actualiza una implementación de ClickOnce en un equipo.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> escribir programas de instalación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicaciones mediante programación.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede utilizar esta clase en un entorno de software (SMS) de administración de sistema controlado o en situaciones en las que necesite una instalación compleja que realiza una serie de operaciones previas o posteriores a la instalación en el equipo local.

trans-unit.source: Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order:
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, deseará utilizar a los miembros de esta clase en un orden específico:

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: Cree una nueva instancia de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.

trans-unit.source: Download the deployment manifest by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Descargar el manifiesto de implementación mediante <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Compruebe que la aplicación se puede ejecutar con los permisos adecuados mediante <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Download and install the application by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Descargar e instalar la aplicación mediante el uso de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si llama a cualquiera de estos parámetros en el orden correcto, producirá una excepción.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> puede instalar un [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación, pero no puede ejecutarla.

trans-unit.source: Some methods in this class, such as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Algunos métodos de esta clase, como <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, se reservan para uso al descargar una aplicación basada en Windows Presentation Foundation que se ejecuta en un explorador Web.

trans-unit.source: To use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: Usar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> para descargar e instalar aplicaciones, debe asegurarse de que el certificado para firmar el [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicaciones que se van a instalar ya está instalado en los equipos cliente como un editor de confianza.

trans-unit.source: For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b24a1702-8fbe-45b1-87a0-9618a0708f1d).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los editores de confianza, consulte [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b24a1702-8fbe-45b1-87a0-9618a0708f1d).

trans-unit.source: There is currently a product limitation that prevents <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> from working correctly when you debug your code using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Actualmente hay una limitación de producto que impide <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> funcionaran correctamente cuando se depura el código utilizando [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If you debug your application in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si se depura la aplicación en [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] mediante el uso de la tecla F5, el ejemplo producirá excepciones extrañas al llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To debug using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger.
trans-unit.target: Para depurar con [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], iniciar la aplicación sin depurar y, a continuación, adjunte el depurador.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, puede utilizar a otro depurador, como WinDbg.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client computer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> para instalar un [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación mediante programación en un equipo cliente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> to download and install the specified application.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> para descargar e instalar la aplicación especificada.

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (<see cref="T:System.Uri" />) to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Identificador uniforme de recursos (<see cref="T:System.Uri" />) en el manifiesto de implementación de una aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> para descargar e instalar la aplicación especificada hospedada en un explorador.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Se utiliza este constructor cuando desee descargar una aplicación basada en Windows Presentation Foundation que se hospeda en un explorador Web.

trans-unit.source: To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para descargar aplicaciones basadas en formularios Windows Forms que se implementan mediante [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor con la `launchInHostProcess` parámetro establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> sólo se puede utilizar en Windows XP o en versiones posteriores del sistema operativo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass <see langword="null" /> for the <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: No puede pasar <see langword="null" /> para el argumento <paramref name="deploymentManifest" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> utiliza un esquema del URI que no admite [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the deployment manifest of the application that will be installed.
trans-unit.target: Identificador uniforme de recursos (URI) en el manifiesto de implementación de la aplicación que se instalará.

trans-unit.source: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Indica si esta aplicación se ejecutará en un host, como un explorador web.

trans-unit.source: For a stand-alone application, set this value to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Para una aplicación independiente, establezca este valor en <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> para descargar e instalar la aplicación especificada, que puede ser una aplicación independiente basada en formularios Windows Forms o en una aplicación hospedada en un explorador web.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> that allows you to download Windows Forms-based applications deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una instancia de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> que le permite descargar aplicaciones basadas en formularios Windows Forms implementadas mediante [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" /> sólo se puede utilizar en Windows XP o en versiones posteriores del sistema operativo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass <see langword="null" /> for the <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: No puede pasar <see langword="null" /> para el argumento <paramref name="deploymentManifest" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="deploymentManifest" /> utiliza un esquema del URI que no admite [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the ClickOnce application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina si la aplicación ClickOnce tiene los permisos adecuados y las dependencias de plataforma para que se pueda ejecutar en el equipo local.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina si la aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] tiene los permisos adecuados y las dependencias de plataforma para que se pueda ejecutar en el equipo local.

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> after <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> returns successfully.
trans-unit.target: Debe llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> después <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> devuelve correctamente.

trans-unit.source: You must not call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A> unless you call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>, and it returns without error.
trans-unit.target: No se debe llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A> a menos que se llama a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>, y devuelve sin errores.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>, which it calls in the body of a successful <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>, que llama en el cuerpo de una correcta <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Producida si se llama a este método antes que al método <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.
trans-unit.target: Si es <see langword="true" />, la aplicación intentará elevar sus permisos al nivel necesario.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina si la aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] tiene los permisos adecuados y las dependencias de plataforma para que se pueda ejecutar en el equipo local.

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them.
trans-unit.target: Si `grantApplicationTrust` es `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> concederá a la aplicación de permisos elevados, si lo requiere.

trans-unit.source: This is only possible if <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> is able to grant those permissions.
trans-unit.target: Esto sólo es posible si <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> puede conceder dichos permisos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si un [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación se instala como parte de un paquete más grande y el programa de instalación se ha concedido plena confianza, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> podrá conceder el [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación plena confianza.

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.
trans-unit.target: Si `grantApplicationTrust` es `false`, la aplicación no se le concedan los permisos.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela una operación de descarga asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos utilizados por <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: Downloads an application update in the background.
trans-unit.target: Descarga una actualización de la aplicación en segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: You must call this method after calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Debe llamar a este método después de llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>, which it calls at the end of a successful <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event handler.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>, que llama al final de una correcta <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> named `iphm`.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes se supone que ya ha definido y ha creado una instancia de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> denominado `iphm`.

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync" /> and <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: Producida si se llama a este método antes que a los métodos <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync" /> y <see cref="M:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando la aplicación ha finalizado la descarga al equipo local.

trans-unit.source: If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si va a instalar una aplicación basada en formularios Windows Forms, debe indicar a los usuarios para iniciar la aplicación ellos mismos; no se puede iniciar aplicaciones basadas en formularios Windows Forms mediante programación utilizando la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra un controlador para el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando hay un cambio en el estado de la descarga de una aplicación o un manifiesto.

trans-unit.source: In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool.
trans-unit.target: En una aplicación de consola, los eventos se asignan a los subprocesos de un grupo de subprocesos.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, podría recibir eventos de actualización de progreso desordenados, con un evento subsiguiente que muestra una disminución en comparación con un evento anterior.

trans-unit.source: You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue.
trans-unit.target: No verá este comportamiento en una aplicación basada en formularios Windows Forms, porque los eventos en formularios Windows Forms se procesan secuencialmente fuera de la cola de mensajes del subproceso de interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to update a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> that is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo actualizar una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> que está dentro de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Inicia la aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], si y sólo si es una aplicación basada en Windows Presentation Foundation que se ejecute en un explorador web.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle" /> corresponding to the launched application.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle" /> que corresponde a la aplicación iniciada.

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).
trans-unit.target: Este método es válida únicamente para aplicaciones basadas en Windows Presentation Foundation que se pueden hospedar en un explorador Web (es decir, definen sus manifiestos de implementación el `hostInBrowser` elemento XML).

trans-unit.source: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: Descarga el manifiesto de implementación de la aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] en segundo plano y genera un evento cuando la operación ha concluido o detecta un error.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Para recibir una notificación de cuando se completa este evento, cree un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If this event is called, and no error is indicated by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, you should next call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Si se llama a este evento y no se indica ningún error por <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, debe llamar después a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> para comprobar que la aplicación tendrá permiso para ejecutar en el equipo local.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to call the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes muestran cómo llamar a la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application.
trans-unit.target: El controlador para el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> comprobaciones de devolución de llamada de evento para ver si la descarga del manifiesto se completa correctamente y si es así, se pide al usuario con información adicional acerca de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si el usuario acepta continuar la instalación, el controlador llama <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> named `iphm`.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes se supone que ya ha definido y ha creado una instancia de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> denominado `iphm`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando el manifiesto de implementación se ha descargado al equipo local.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to check whether <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully or returned an error.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> para comprobar si <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> se completó correctamente o devolvió un error.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> is null, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully, and you can call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> es null, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> finalizó correctamente y puede llamar a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to call the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes muestran cómo llamar a la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application.
trans-unit.target: El controlador para el <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> comprobaciones de devolución de llamada de evento para ver si la descarga del manifiesto se completa correctamente y si es así, se pide al usuario con información adicional acerca de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si el usuario acepta continuar la instalación, el controlador llama <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> named `iphm`.
trans-unit.target: Los ejemplos de código siguientes se supone que ya ha definido y ha creado una instancia de <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> denominado `iphm`.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the add-in to remove.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene un identificador de suscripción, que indica el complemento que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.
trans-unit.target: Quita de una aplicación un componente definido por el usuario y anteriormente instalado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subscriptionId" /> is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subscriptionId" /> no es una identidad de suscripción válida o no incluye un nombre, un token de clave pública, la arquitectura del procesador ni el número de versión.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subscriptionId" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subscriptionId" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene un identificador de suscripción, que indica la aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.
trans-unit.target: Quita una aplicación [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] que incluye el elemento <customUX>.

trans-unit.source: This method uninstalls a previously installed [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that uses the `<customUX>` element in the [<entryPoint> Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f).
trans-unit.target: Este método desinstala instalado previamente [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación que utiliza el `<customUX>` elemento en el [ <entryPoint> elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f).

trans-unit.source: Custom installers that do not create an Add or Remove Programs entry for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application must store the subscription identifier found in the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs.SubscriptionIdentity%2A> property during installation.
trans-unit.target: Instaladores personalizados que no crean una entrada de agregar o quitar programas para la [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicación debe almacenar el identificador de suscripción encontrado en la <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs.SubscriptionIdentity%2A> propiedad durante la instalación.
